description.name: Seat headrest holder for tablet or mobile phone
description.long_desc:
Car Headrest Mount for Phone and Tablet



  • Foldable Design

  • Adjustable width (depending on the device size)

  • Access to charging port, headphone jack, etc.

  • Reliable and sturdy mount for the headrest of the driver's or passenger's seat

  • Soft side clamps

  • Strong spring in the mount ensures a secure attachment for smartphones or tablets

  • Easy installation and removal

  • Brand: Keltin

  • Material: Plastic

  • Supported device size range: 4.5 - 11"

  • Adjustment: horizontal position, tilt angle adjustment

  • Our mount has a practical folding mechanism, making it easy to store when not in use, saving space in the car.


 


Wide Range of Adjustments


The car headrest mount has a wide range of adjustments (extension of the mount). We can extend the mount up to 27cm from the mounting point.


The adjustment allows for a convenient positioning of the mount closer to the center of the car, allowing all rear-seat passengers to comfortably watch movies.


 


360° Rotating Head


The rotating head allows free rotation of the mount/phone, making it perfect for watching movies and browsing social media or watching videos.


The sturdy spring that grips ensures a secure attachment of the smartphone or tablet, providing safety during the journey.


 


Easy Access to Ports


Thanks to special holes on the sides of the mount, we have the ability to directly connect a charger or headphones, significantly increasing the convenience of use.


 


Easy Installation


The mount should be attached with the first clamp to the headrest, then, pressing the second clamp, insert it into the other side of the headrest.


The mount is equipped with soft side clamps that protect the device from scratches and damage.

description.name: 20pcs self-adhesive cable clips holders (30x10mm)
description.long_desc:
Cable Organizer Set - 20 Pieces


A seemingly modest but incredibly practical gadget that will forever solve the problem of tangled cables and wires. Use the strong 3M tape to attach the clips to most smooth and flat surfaces, such as desks, near the TV, or inside your car.


Product characteristics:


?? Made of durable, crack-resistant plastic


?? Equipped with double-sided 3M mounting tape


?? Quickly and aesthetically solve the problem of tangled wires and cables


?? Set of 20 clips with base dimensions: 30x10 mm


?? Option for screw mounting

description.name: 75mm disc for rust
description.long_desc:
A 75mm diameter sanding disc made of flexible Clean&Strip fiber.


Thanks to its structure and high resilience, the fiber allows for cleaning flat surfaces as well as surfaces with more complex shapes.


Discs of this type are primarily used for cleaning surfaces from rust, cleaning welds, various types of paint, putty, and scale.


The fiber can also be used to process materials such as colored metals, wood, stainless steel, structural steel, plastics, etc.


Product characteristics:



  • Spatial structure prevents clogging and material overheating.

  • Numerous channels dissipate heat and dust away from the processed surface.

  • High material resilience.


Technical specifications:


Material: Clean&Strip fiber


Grit: silicon carbide


Outer diameter: 75 mm

description.name: Gasoline enigne Loncin 196cc 20mm EURO 5
description.long_desc:
The 6.5 HP LONCIN four-stroke gasoline engine serves as a reliable source of power for various types of machines such as compactors, water pumps, wood chippers, trowels, saws, generators, and snow blowers. Not only does it provide substantial power, but it also boasts unparalleled precision in its construction and high-quality materials used.


Technical Specifications:


Engine Manufacturer: Loncin


Engine Displacement: 196 cc


Engine Model: G200F


Cylinder Bore x Stroke: 68x54mm


Engine Type: Single-cylinder, four-stroke


Valve System: OHV (Overhead Valve)


Maximum Power Output: 6.5 HP


Rotation Speed: 3600 RPM (Revolutions per Minute)


Shaft Diameter: 20 mm


Fuel: Unleaded gasoline


Fuel Tank Capacity: 3.6 liters


Oil Capacity: 600 ml


Cooling System: Air-cooled


Ignition: Electric


Starting Mechanism: Manual, pull-start with a cord

description.name: Regulator for CO2/ARGON
description.long_desc:
Przedstawiamy nasz zaawansowany reduktor gazu CO2/Argon, ktry zapewnia precyzyjn kontrol przepywu gazu oraz cinienia wejciowego. Reduktor jest niezbdnym narzdziem w procesach spawania i cicia. Ten reduktor zosta wyposaony w dwa manometry, z ktrych kady znajduje si w gumowej osonie, co zapewnia dodatkow ochron i wygod podczas pracy.

Gwne cechy reduktora gazu CO2/Argon:

  • Precyzyjna kontrola przepywu: Reduktor zapewnia precyzyjn kontrol przepywu gazu CO2/Argon, umoliwiajc dostosowanie go do indywidualnych potrzeb i wymaga procesw spawania czy cicia. Dziki temu moesz osign optymalne rezultaty i doskona jako wykonywanych prac.
  • Dwa manometry: Reduktor jest wyposaony w dwa manometry, ktre umoliwiaj monitorowanie przepywu, jak i cinienia wejciowego. Dziki temu masz pen kontrol podczas pracy i moesz dokadnie ledzi zmiany cinienia podczas pracy.
  • Gumowe osony manometrw: Kady z manometrw zosta umieszczony w gumowej osonie, ktra chroni je przed uszkodzeniami mechanicznymi, wstrzsami czy przypadkowym upadkiem.
  • Wygodne i praktyczne wykonanie: Reduktor zosta zaprojektowany z myl o wygodzie i ergonomii uytkowania. Posiada ergonomicznie rozmieszczone pokrta regulacyjne, ktre umoliwiaj precyzyjn kontrol przepywu gazu.

Specyfikacja techniczna:

Rodzaj gazu: CO2, Argon, mieszkanka CO2/Argon

Gwint na wlocie: W21.8x1/14

Gwint nakrtki na wylocie: G1/4

Krciec wylotowy: 6,3 mm

Cinienie wlotowe: 230 Bar

Cinienie wylotowe: 0-5 Bar

Przepustowo: 24 l/min

description.name: Universal 3in1 phone holder
description.long_desc:
Car Telescopic Phone Holder for Windshield, Dashboard, and Vent


- an indispensable gadget that provides you with safe and convenient access to your phone while driving!


Its versatile application allows mounting on the windshield, dashboard, or air vent grille, so you can choose the most convenient location that perfectly suits your preferences. The soft side clamps ensure that your phone remains secure and scratch-free even during dynamic driving.



  • Compatible with all phones

  • Color: black


 


3-in-1 Holder


The high-quality holder can be mounted on the dashboard or attached to the windshield. The set also includes a attachment for mounting on the air vent grille.


Thanks to these solutions, the mounting location is at the user's discretion.


 


Key Features



  • Holder made of high-quality ABS and PC

  • Wide range of phone sizes: 4 - 7.5"

  • Rubber, non-slip clamps to grip and protect the phone

  • Adjustment of the base arm up to 240°

  • The holder can be easily installed on the windshield, dashboard, or car air vent grille

  • Secure and stable grip

  • Easy installation and removal

  • The holder has a specially designed space to connect a charger or headphones

  • Convenient opening of the holder arms with a button

  • 360° rotatable head

  • Phone mounting method: clamp

  • Holder mounting location: windshield / dashboard / air vent grille

  • Additional information: telescopic arm included


 


Safety During Travel


Very strong suction cup can handle even very bumpy roads.


Rubber, non-slip pads located in the clamps provide a very strong grip and protect the phone from mechanical damage.


 


Comfort - Just the Way You Like It!


The most important feature of the holder is the telescopic arm, which allows smooth adjustment of the distance of the phone from the windshield or dashboard. This is particularly useful in cars with a steeply inclined front windshield. This way, you will always find the optimal position to comfortably use the phone while maintaining full visibility.


 


Seamless Charging


Thanks to a special hole at the bottom of the holder, we have the possibility of directly connecting a charger or headphones, which significantly increases the user's comfort.


 


360° Head


Convenient 360° heads allow for comfortable positioning of the phone at the desired angle.
description.short_desc:
Car Telescopic Phone Holder for Windshield, Dashboard, and Vent


- an indispensable gadget that provides you with safe and convenient access to your phone while driving!


Its versatile application allows mounting on the windshield, dashboard, or air vent grille, so you can choose the most convenient location that perfectly suits your preferences. The soft side clamps ensure that your phone remains secure and scratch-free even during dynamic driving.



  • Compatible with all phones

  • Color: black


 


3-in-1 Holder


The high-quality holder can be mounted on the dashboard or attached to the windshield. The set also includes a attachment for mounting on the air vent grille.


Thanks to these solutions, the mounting location is at the user's discretion.


 


Key Features



  • Holder made of high-quality ABS and PC

  • Wide range of phone sizes: 4 - 7.5"

  • Rubber, non-slip clamps to grip and protect the phone

  • Adjustment of the base arm up to 240°

  • The holder can be easily installed on the windshield, dashboard, or car air vent grille

  • Secure and stable grip

  • Easy installation and removal

  • The holder has a specially designed space to connect a charger or headphones

  • Convenient opening of the holder arms with a button

  • 360° rotatable head

  • Phone mounting method: clamp

  • Holder mounting location: windshield / dashboard / air vent grille

  • Additional information: telescopic arm included


 


Safety During Travel


Very strong suction cup can handle even very bumpy roads.


Rubber, non-slip pads located in the clamps provide a very strong grip and protect the phone from mechanical damage.

category_idosell.path: Joining Tools\Carpentry Clamps

description.name: Set of 90 degree angle spring clamps 4pcs.
description.long_desc:
Professional 4-piece carpentry clamps are an invaluable aid during the assembly of boards and frames at a 90-degree angle. With them, you can quickly and easily fasten boards and frames, for example, when installing shelves, small cabinets, and frames. They are the perfect tool for both screwing and gluing boards, allowing you to join elements in "T" and angular configurations.


The clamps are particularly useful for joining boards of different thicknesses, ranging from 5 to 22 mm. With them, you can achieve precise connections without the need for multiple tools and additional accessories.


Our carpentry clamps are designed with comfort and efficiency in mind. They are equipped with a practical one-handed operation function, which means you can handle them with one hand. This greatly simplifies and speeds up the assembly process while giving you greater freedom of movement.


Product features:



  • Made of durable plastic material

  • Sliding jaws allow clamping elements of different thicknesses

  • Equipped with strong springs

  • Invaluable for making angular and "T" connections

  • Set includes 4 clamps

  • Adapted to work with elements ranging from 5 to 22 mm in thickness

description.name: Capacitive precise touch screen stylus pen
description.long_desc:
The capacitive stylus is a true multitasking marvel. On one side, it functions as a capacitive stylus, perfect for precise drawing, writing, or navigating on the screen of your smartphone/tablet. On the other side, it is a classic pen that is ideal for traditional note-taking.


With this stylus, you always have the right tool at hand, regardless of the situation. No more need to carry both a pen and a stylusnow you have everything in one elegant device!

description.name: 2in1 barbecue grill brush with scraper
description.long_desc:
A brush with a scraper for cleaning the barbecue. Handle manufactured from durable plastic. The brush has 8 rows of corrugated steel wire. The device is irreplaceable when cleaning the grill from solidified fat and soot. A scraper integrated with the brush is designed for larger and more stubborn dirt.


Product characteristics:



  • irreplaceable during the barbecue season

  • you can easily get rid of dried fat

  • the scraper copes well with larger dirt

  • it has 8 rows of corrugated steel wire

  • light, handy and durable construction

description.name: 10pcs barbecue grill accessories set
description.long_desc:
Jeli jeste mionikiem grillowania i szukasz narzdzi, ktre pomog Ci osign mistrzowskie rezultaty, to ten zestaw jest dla Ciebie. Zaprojektowany z myl o entuzjastach grillowania, nasze sztuce s niezastpionym towarzyszem Twojej przygody kulinarno-piknikowej.

Wszystkie nasze sztuce do grilla wykonane s ze stali nierdzewnej, co gwarantuje trwao, odporno na korozj i dug ywotno. Nasze sztuce do grilla nie tylko zapewniaj niezawodno i funkcjonalno, ale take s estetyczne. Ich nowoczesny design dodaje stylu Twoim grillowym przyjciom, przycigajc wzrok goci i podkrelajc Twoje wyrafinowane zamiowanie do grillowania.

Charakterystyka zestawu:

  • Widelec do obracania misa: Precyzyjne obracanie i kontrola nad Twoimi ulubionymi kawakami misa bez wysiku.
  • Szczypce: Pewne chwytanie i delikatne przekadanie potraw dla zachowania idealnej struktury i smaku.
  • opatka: Wytrzymae narzdzie do bezpiecznego podnoszenia wikszych kawakw misa czy warzyw z rusztu.
  • N: Precyzyjne krojenie i przygotowywanie grillowanych potraw z atwoci i komfortem.
  • Pdzel kuchenny: Doskonae smarowanie potraw ulubionymi sosami i marynatami dla peni smaku i aromatu.
  • 4 patyki do szaszykw: Twrz pyszne i kreatywne kompozycje misa, warzyw i owocw na ronie.
  • Najwysza jako: Wykonane z trwaej stali nierdzewnej, gwarantujce dugotrwa wydajno i odporno na korozj.
  • Wygoda w uyciu: Ergonomiczne rkojeci zapewniaj pewny chwyt i maksymalny komfort podczas grillowania.
  • Estetyczny design: Nowoczesny wygld, ktry doda stylu Twoim grillowym przyjciom i przycignie wzrok goci.
  • Kompletno: Zestaw zawiera wszystkie niezbdne narzdzia, aby sta si prawdziwym mistrzem grilla.
  • Uniwersalno: Idealny zarwno dla grillowania w ogrodzie, na tarasie czy podczas piknikw na wieym powietrzu.

Nie tra czasu na poszukiwanie pojedynczych narzdzi

Nasz zestaw sztucw do grilla zapewnia pen funkcjonalno, trwao i satysfakcj. Sta si mistrzem grilla i zaskocz swoich bliskich niezapomnianymi smakami, korzystajc z tego doskonaego zestawu.

description.name: Webbing belt sling 1T 1M 30mm
description.long_desc:
We present our web slings, which are indispensable for transporting and lifting heavy objects. The slings are designed to be safe, durable, and easy to use and provide you with an effective solution when lifting and carrying a wide variety of loads.


Main features of web slings:



  • Durable materials: Our slings are made of high-quality, tensile, and damage-resistant materials such as polyester or nylon. These materials are characterized by high tensile strength, which allows for the safe lifting of even heavy objects.

  • Certificates and standards: Our slings have the appropriate certificates and EN standards, which confirm compliance with the highest safety and quality standards. You can rest assured that our slings are tested and proven for strength and reliability.

  • Wide application: Webbing slings are used in various fields and industries. They can be used in warehouses, construction sites, transport, industry, or in-home garages. They are ideal for lifting and moving heavy objects such as pallets, steel structures, machinery, or furniture.


An example of the use of belt slings::



  • Pallet handling: Belt slings are perfect for moving pallets with goods in warehouses, production halls, or shops. Thanks to them, you can safely lift and transport heavy pallet loads.

  • Assembly of steel constructions: Webbing slings are irreplaceable during the assembly and lifting of steel constructions. They allow for precise and controlled lifting of large elements, ensuring safe and effective work.

  • Moving machinery and equipment: Webbing slings are used when moving and positioning heavy machinery and equipment at their destination. They are also used in car workshops, e.g. when removing engines.


Technical data:


Material: Poliester (PES)


Load: 1 T


Length: 1 m


Width: 30 mm


safety factor: 7:1


Manufactured to: EN 1492-1

  • Wide application: Webbing slings are used in various fields and industries. They can be used in warehouses, construction sites, transport, industry, or in-home garages. They are ideal for lifting and moving heavy objects such as pallets, steel structures, machinery, or furniture.

  • Pallet handling: Belt slings are perfect for moving pallets with goods in warehouses, production halls, or shops. Thanks to them, you can safely lift and transport heavy pallet loads.
